reviews.title: Why hide the high score?!
reviews.comment: I see the pot is much lower,.. Awesome! Except now you don\'t display the true high score. I gotta tell you, I was pretty mad when I thought I beat the high score only to find out that its not showing the highest score. Why did u change that? Makes it seem like a scam for you to get more money for us clicking on the banner when there is no real chance of winning. Are there any honest people in the world anymore? Thanks for the answer. I know I would be motivated if I could see what I had to beat. I actually uninstalled the game because of it. If you ever change it back to showing the highest score, post a reply and I will definitely redownload!
reviews.author: Mike Wilco

reviews.title: fake

reviews.title: Sucks
